cab.content: A.P: From Political Resident, Aden, 3rd June 1917. : . ff^L(J^ (Repeated to Simla.) (Received at India Office, 1.50 p.m.)Your telegram of the 1st instant re Yemen received.m m Secretary of State to Viceroy, Foreign Department, 1st June 1917. (Repeated to Resident, Aden.) Secret. My telegram dated 25th May. Yemen. After further"careful consideration, His Majesty's Government have decided that Residents proposal should not be proceeded with. He should therefore reply as suggested in your telegram of 17th May, but making it quite clear that any bond fide movement against the Turks is welcome to us. Careful watch should be kept and the earliest possible intimation given of Italian movements.
